other_title: ケイオスドラゴン 赤竜戦役 (Japanese)
plot: In the sparkling era year 3015, the great nations Donatia and Kouran divided the world in a cold war as they fight for supremacy. In the middle of this standoff is island country Nil Kamui, which has lost its independence.
ending_theme: "Delta Decision" by Miyuki Sawashiro, Haruka Terui, & Maaya Uchida
"Sleep without a memory" by Natsumi Kon (ep 12)
